And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> in<S>1909</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of him that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S> a book<S>975</S> written<S>1125</S> within<S>2081</S> and<S>2532</S> on the backside<S>3693</S>, sealed<S>2696</S> with seven<S>2033</S> seals<S>4973</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> a strong<S>2478</S> angel<S>32</S> proclaiming<S>2784</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, Who<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> worthy<S>514</S> to open<S>455</S> the book<S>975</S>, and<S>2532</S> to loose<S>3089</S> the seals<S>4973</S> thereof<S>846</S>?
And<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, nor<S>3761</S> in<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S>, neither<S>3761</S> under<S>5270</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, was able<S>1410</S> to open<S>455</S> the book<S>975</S>, neither<S>3761</S> to look<S>991</S> thereon<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> wept<S>2799</S> much<S>4183</S>, because<S>3754</S> no man<S>3762</S> was found<S>2147</S> worthy<S>514</S> to open<S>455</S> and<S>2532</S> to read<S>314</S> the book<S>975</S>, neither<S>3777</S> to look<S>991</S> thereon<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the elders<S>4245</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Weep<S>2799</S> not<S>3361</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, the Lion<S>3023</S> of<S>5607</S> <S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Juda<S>2455</S>, the Root<S>4491</S> of David<S>1138</S>, hath prevailed<S>3528</S> to open<S>455</S> the book<S>975</S>, and<S>2532</S> to loose<S>3089</S> the seven<S>2033</S> seals<S>4973</S> thereof<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of the throne<S>2362</S> and<S>2532</S> of the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of the elders<S>4245</S>, stood<S>2476</S> a Lamb<S>721</S> as<S>5613</S> it had been slain<S>4969</S>, having<S>2192</S> seven<S>2033</S> horns<S>2768</S> and<S>2532</S> seven<S>2033</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, which<S>3739</S> are<S>1526</S> the seven<S>2033</S> Spirits<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S> sent forth<S>649</S> into<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> the earth<S>1093</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> took<S>2983</S> the book<S>975</S> out of<S>1537</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of him that sat<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had taken<S>2983</S> the book<S>975</S>, the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S> and<S>2532</S> four<S>5064</S> and twenty<S>1501</S> elders<S>4245</S> fell down<S>4098</S> before<S>1799</S> the Lamb<S>721</S>, having<S>2192</S> every one of them<S>1538</S> harps<S>2788</S>, and<S>2532</S> golden<S>5552</S> vials<S>5357</S> full<S>1073</S> of odours<S>2368</S>, which<S>3739</S> are<S>1526</S> the prayers<S>4335</S> of saints<S>40</S>. <sup>odours: or, incense</sup>
And<S>2532</S> they sung<S>103</S> a new<S>2537</S> song<S>5603</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Thou art<S>1488</S> worthy<S>514</S> to take<S>2983</S> the book<S>975</S>, and<S>2532</S> to open<S>455</S> the seals<S>4973</S> thereof<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> thou wast slain<S>4969</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast redeemed<S>59</S> us<S>2248</S> to God<S>2316</S> by<S>1722</S> thy<S>4675</S> blood<S>129</S> out of<S>1537</S> every<S>3956</S> kindred<S>5443</S>, and<S>2532</S> tongue<S>1100</S>, and<S>2532</S> people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> nation<S>1484</S>;
And<S>2532</S> hast made<S>4160</S> us<S>2248</S> unto our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S> kings<S>935</S> and<S>2532</S> priests<S>2409</S>: and<S>2532</S> we shall reign<S>936</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> the voice<S>5456</S> of many<S>4183</S> angels<S>32</S> round about<S>2943</S> the throne<S>2362</S> and<S>2532</S> the beasts<S>2226</S> and<S>2532</S> the elders<S>4245</S>: and<S>2532</S> the number<S>706</S> of them<S>846</S> was<S>2258</S> ten thousand<S>3461</S> times ten thousand<S>3461</S>, and<S>2532</S> thousands<S>5505</S> of thousands<S>5505</S>;
Saying<S>3004</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, Worthy<S>514</S> is<S>2076</S> the Lamb<S>721</S> that was slain<S>4969</S> to receive<S>2983</S> power<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> riches<S>4149</S>, and<S>2532</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>, and<S>2532</S> strength<S>2479</S>, and<S>2532</S> honour<S>5092</S>, and<S>2532</S> glory<S>1391</S>, and<S>2532</S> blessing<S>2129</S>.
And<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> creature<S>2938</S> which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, and<S>2532</S> on<S>1722</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> under<S>5270</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> such as<S>3739</S> are<S>2076</S> in<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> that are in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>, heard I<S>191</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Blessing<S>2129</S>, and<S>2532</S> honour<S>5092</S>, and<S>2532</S> glory<S>1391</S>, and<S>2532</S> power<S>2904</S>, be unto him that sitteth<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> unto the Lamb<S>721</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S> said<S>3004</S>, Amen<S>281</S>. And<S>2532</S> the four<S>5064</S> and twenty<S>1501</S> elders<S>4245</S> fell down<S>4098</S> and<S>2532</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> him that liveth<S>2198</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>.
